body:
Hi I'm new. Ask me anything

-Erynor

title: Hi server - AMA

replies.body: Do you like avicus so far?
replies.body_tagged: Do you like avicus so far?

replies.body: Welcome to Avicus! Opinions on Avicus? Where do you live? Favourite food? Favourite Fruit? Favourite animal?

reply_to.body: Do you like avicus so far?

replies.body: Thanks. I like it, but the forums seem to be broken everytime i try and make a post. I live in the world, i like peaches, and ponies.

replies.body: How did you get your username?

replies.body:
That broken stuff was accidentally added on last weeks' website revamp, we have our very best trained cats into fixing it; nevertheless, you shall not worry too much, as the post will be published regardless if you get an error.

Feel free to ask any questions! Welcome mate

replies.body:
Why is it that when I'm in obs, I can always see people following me? Like they go around me, if I look left, they go left. And they're always player's names, so when I look them up, it says they're online on another server, or not on at all?

well, it's just the usernames. I can't actually see any skins or players at all. just the names
